let your<WG5216> wives<WG1135> keep silent<WG4601> in<WG1722> the assemblies,<WG1577> for<WG1063> it has not<WG3756> been<WG2010> permitted<WG2010> for them<WG846> to speak;<WG2980> but<WG235> let them be in subjection,<WG5293> as<WG2531> the law<WG3551> also<WG2532> says.<WG3004>
